translated: Ā If one recites this mind mantra chapter of the vajra-formed body, speech, and mind once, one will attain the firm accomplishment of all secret mudrās of the three vajra actions of body, speech, and mind.

original: 所有本尊等諸法用，於三部中或復二部當得成就；
analyzed: 所有本尊等諸法用，於三部中或復二部當得成就；
translated: The methods of all deities and other dharmas, within the three divisions or two divisions, will be accomplished;

original: 於現生中即得成佛，或成金剛手尊！
analyzed: 於現生中即得成佛，或成金剛手尊！
translated: in this very life one will attain buddhahood, or become Vajrapāṇi.
